I have never experienced any safety issues while attending Keiser University.
Students that work full-time or Part-time. Career oriented students. Military and long distance students. Students of all ages and returning students that took a break from college.
Exceptional school for the tuition prices. Keiser University is well worth the money for all the work and resources they provide to make sure every student is progressing.
Join a club and find ways to better the campus!
To sum it up in one word, Amazing! Keiser Culinary Arts program provides the students with outstanding treats! Vending machines on campus if you need a snack.
I attend a Keiser University that does not have a dorm.

The classes are challenging,but the professors are dedicated to provide assistance during and after class to assist the students. The academics at Keiser University prepares the students for real life situations. Keiser academics are strongly integrated to provide each student with a challenge that forces one to tap into their creativity, problem solving, and networking skills.
Be prepared to learn! Utilize all resources provided through the school. Communication is the key to your success at Keiser University.

Excellent resources provided to help the student achieve goals. Highly trained and dedicated faculty that ensures a safe and effective learning environment. A university that is tailored to your lifestyle to help you succeed.

textAfterTable: Bang for the buck The tuition at Keiser is somewhat expensive but I definitely feel that it will be worth it. Am enjoying being here I believe I will enjoy being a student at this university. I feel honored that they have accepted me to be apart of their family. Am learning a lot Actually I have just recently been accepted to Keiser University but as I can tell so far the university staff are highly educated and very effective in helping their students acquire their goals. I am looking forward to the experience of attending Keiser University.
